title: anjezuttinai nenjilEy
sahitya:
anjezhuttinai nenjilE ninai vanjakamellAm anjiyODumE

(anjezhuttinil)



anupallavi



nanjaDakkiya nAn maraiyanai nADavum nalam tEDavum sheyyum

(anjezhuttinai)



caraNam



UrupADillAda uyarvai aLikkum unnaiyE uNara uDalai vaLarkkum

mAru pADuDaiya manattai-yodukkum maiyalai-yagaTri magizhvai

koDukkum 

(anjezhuttinai)
